name: Xenotown (Demo Page)
description:
Demo Page for XENOTOWN - A small RPG where you play as an alien in disguise, on a mission to brainwash the people of Earth, one person at a time. Join up with an Earth child and a germaphobic toilet on your quest to control the planet.
CONTROLS
Select the red icon that says "Game" in your downloaded folder to start the demo. Press "z" and "x" to interact with objects, and the arrow keys to move around. Vending machines can be used to buy health items or weapons. Gamepads should also work when connected, but we haven't tried that many models out.
DETAILS
This demo is a rough, streamlined portion of what we want the full game to be like. After this section, the suburb area will be fully unlocked, with every house and building open for exploration. The small suburb area will be 1 out of 3 larger "overworlds" that you will fight through on your mission to conquer the secluded town of Pineville, with additional sections in between.  The content in this demo is just the opening of the game, and while nothing else has been made fully playable yet, we do have large portions of the project roughly mapped out.
Let us know what you thought of the demo! There are 2 people working on XenoTown (Made in Wolf RPG editor) who have no prior experience in game development, art, or alien invasions.
The full game will likely cost $4.99. We are planning on a play time of at least 10 or more hours, with multiple endings. Feel free to donate on this page if you'd like to help us pay for publishing fees, or for shrinkwrapped sardines to eat when we're working on the game.
Check out some of the soundtrack below, and follow us on Itch or Youtube! Thanks!
Link to our Youtube Channel
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIhGHQSdtCBgeseruSNMdCA
Soundtrack Playlist
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLpUE4Hwcur5VTAVlK4r4OoTbokQG71jMk
Note: There are a few bugs in the demo. Let us know if you find any so we can fix them in the full release, whenever it gets finished. Audio levels and the combat system will also be balanced better in the final version. Warning: Features explicit language and some violence.
